languages.text: {n}Один из Ревущих, собрав гордость в кулак, задирает подбородок.{/n} "Да! Мы — выродки смерти, безродные убийцы! Раньше Злоба вел нас к смерти, а теперь ты веди!"
{n}One of the Shriekers answers proudly, chin raised high:{/n} "Yes! We are deathspawn, murderous wretches! Malice led us to our deaths before — you lead us now!"
languages.original_text: {n}Один из Ревущих, собрав гордость в кулак, задирает подбородок.{/n} "Да! Мы — выродки смерти, безродные убийцы! Раньше Злоба вел нас к смерти, а теперь ты веди!"

traits.locale_text: {n}One of the Shriekers answers proudly, chin raised high.{/n} "Yes! We are deathspawn, murderous wretches! Malice used to lead us to our deaths — you lead us now!"
traits.speaker: DrukhariRanger_Ranged_Prison

traits.locale_text: {n}One of the Shriekers answers proudly, chin raised high:{/n} "Yes! We are deathspawn, murderous wretches! Malice led us to our deaths before — you lead us now!"
traits.speaker: DrukhariRanger_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}シュリーカーのひとりが、顎を高く上げて誇らしげに答える。{/n}「そうだ！我々は死神、殺人鬼だ！かつてはマリスが我々を死に導いたが、これからはあなたに従う！」
languages.original_text: {n}One of the Shriekers answers proudly, chin raised high:{/n} "Yes! We are deathspawn, murderous wretches! Malice led us to our deaths before — you lead us now!"

traits.locale_text: {n}シュリーカーのひとりが、顎を高く上げて誇らしげに答える。{/n}「そうだ！我々は死神、殺人鬼だ！かつてはマリスが我々を死に導いたが、これからはあなたに従う！」
traits.speaker: DrukhariRanger_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}其中一个尖啸者扬起了下巴，自豪地回答起来。{/n}“没错！我们就是凶残的杀人狂，死亡的子嗣！过去是恶棍将我们引向死亡，现在由你将我们引向死亡！”
languages.original_text: {n}One of the Shriekers answers proudly, chin raised high:{/n} "Yes! We are deathspawn, murderous wretches! Malice led us to our deaths before — you lead us now!"

traits.locale_text: {n}其中一个尖啸者扬起了下巴，自豪地回答起来。{/n}“没错！我们就是凶残的杀人狂，死亡的子嗣！过去是恶棍将我们引向死亡，现在由你将我们引向死亡！”
traits.speaker: DrukhariRanger_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}Uno de los Aulladores responde orgulloso, con la barbilla bien alta:{/n} «¡Sí! ¡Somos engendros de la muerte, asesinos miserables! Malicia nos guiaba hacia la muerte antes... ¡ahora lo haces tú!».
languages.original_text: {n}One of the Shriekers answers proudly, chin raised high:{/n} "Yes! We are deathspawn, murderous wretches! Malice led us to our deaths before — you lead us now!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Uno de los Aulladores responde orgulloso, con la barbilla bien alta:{/n} «¡Sí! ¡Somos engendros de la muerte, asesinos miserables! Malicia solía guiarnos hacia la muerte, ¡ahora lo haces tú!».
traits.speaker: DrukhariRanger_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}Einer der Kreischer antwortet stolz, das Kinn in die Luft gereckt:{/n} "Ja! Wir sind Todesbrut, mörderischer Abschaum! Bisher hat uns Tücke in den Tod geführt ... jetzt führt Ihr uns an!"
languages.original_text: {n}One of the Shriekers answers proudly, chin raised high:{/n} "Yes! We are deathspawn, murderous wretches! Malice led us to our deaths before — you lead us now!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Einer der Kreischer antwortet stolz, das Kinn in die Luft gereckt:{/n} "Ja! Wir sind Todesbrut, mörderischer Abschaum! Früher hat uns Tücke in den Tod geführt. Führt Ihr uns jetzt an!"
traits.speaker: DrukhariRanger_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}L'un des Hurleurs lève fièrement le menton.{/n} « Oui ! Nous sommes les rejetons de la faucheuse, de misérables assassins ! Malice nous menait à notre mort, et maintenant, ce sera vous ! »
languages.original_text: {n}One of the Shriekers answers proudly, chin raised high:{/n} "Yes! We are deathspawn, murderous wretches! Malice led us to our deaths before — you lead us now!"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'un des Hurleurs lève fièrement le menton.{/n} « Oui ! Nous sommes les rejetons de la faucheuse, de misérables assassins voués à se sacrifier ! Malice nous menait à notre mort, et maintenant, ce sera vous ! »
traits.speaker: DrukhariRanger_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}Çığırtkanlardan biri, başını gururla kaldırıp cevap veriyor.{/n} "Evet! Bizler alçak katilleriz, ölümdölleriyiz! Eskiden ölümümüze giden yolda bize Melanet önderlik ederdi... Şimdi siz edeceksiniz!"
languages.original_text: {n}One of the Shriekers answers proudly, chin raised high:{/n} "Yes! We are deathspawn, murderous wretches! Malice led us to our deaths before — you lead us now!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Çığırtkanlardan biri, başını gururla kaldırıp cevap veriyor.{/n} "Evet! Bizler alçak katilleriz, ölümdölleriyiz! Eskiden ölümümüze giden yolda bize Melanet önderlik ederdi... Şimdi siz edeceksiniz!"
traits.speaker: DrukhariRanger_Ranged_Prison
